text_logic_form: The measure of angle $ABC$ is $2x - 7$ degrees.
The measure of angle $BCD$ is $2x + 3$ degrees.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The measure of angle $ABC$ is $2x - 7$ degrees.
The measure of angle $BCD$ is $2x + 3$ degrees.
diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
The lines $AP$ and $DP$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $BD$, $DC$, $CA$, and $AB$, forming the rhombus.
The lines $BP$ and $DP$ are diagonals of the rhombus.
The lines $CP$ and $AP$ are diagonals of the rhombus.
